info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 4 at 9:31PM CDT by NWS Louisville KY
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Kentucky...
Ohio River at Tell City affecting Perry and Hancock Counties.
Ohio River at McAlpine Upper affecting Floyd, Jefferson, Clark and Oldham Counties.
Ohio River at Cannelton Lock and Dam affecting Crawford, Hancock, Perry and Breckinridge Counties.
Ohio River at McAlpine Lower affecting Clark, Meade, Hardin, Jefferson, Floyd and Harrison Counties.
Ohio River at Clifty Creek affecting Jefferson and Trimble Counties.
.Heavy rain from the past few days will cause the river to rise.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Ohio River at McAlpine Upper.
* WHEN...From Saturday morning until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Utica Pike floods at Duffy's Landing in Jeffersonville. At 32.0 feet, 2nd Street is floodgate is closed. At 34.0 feet, Bingham Way is closed at floodgate. Water floods East Riverside Road near Fisherman's Wharf in Jeffersonville.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EDT Friday the stage was 19.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning and continue rising to a crest of 35.5 feet early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 35.7 feet on 02/26/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk.
The next statement will be issued by Saturday afternoon at 100 PM CDT /200 PM EDT/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

area.areaDesc: Clark, IN; Floyd, IN; Jefferson, KY; Oldham, KY
